reviewText: I gave this to my younger brother and he was absolutely delighted to watch the "prequel" to the Ronald McDonald VHS series. It was colorful, fun, and entertaining
A first Ronald McDonald Classic animated film

This cartoon is a good adapatation of Robert Louis Stevenson's classic novel and so thusly I gave it 5 stars. However, at heart it's just McDonalds trying to spread its facets and make even more money, hence the but in the title. Still, if your kids are into pirates and buried treasure, they will be in for a treat, albeit a somewhat dated one.
